contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 3, 1932 D Hessle Contest
Hessle Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
hessle-contest
None
Hessle Mount, Hessle, Yorkshire March contest(own choice) - 1st Driffield, 2nd Scunthorpe, 3rd Hull Kingston. Hymn tune contest(Deep Harmony) - 1st Scunthorpe, 2nd Hull, 3rd Driffield. 3 bands competed.
Oct. 19, 2013, 2:08 p.m. Dec. 13, 2016, 7:25 p.m.
1 Scunthorpe Borough British Legion J. Gilboy
2 Driffield Silver Band V. Yeadon
3 Hull Kingston W. Smith
Withdrawn Barton Town Band Unknown
Withdrawn Brigg Town Brass Band Unknown
Withdrawn West Hull Prize Band Unknown
